name: Tambourine
tagline: Technology and Creativity to increase revenue
description: Tambourine drives awareness, traffic and direct revenue for hotels and resorts worldwide using advanced marketing technology. The firm, with offices in New York City, Fort Lauderdale, Florida and Bogota, Colombia is celebrating its 32nd year in the hotel and tourism industry. Symphony, our flagship product, delivers all-inclusive digital marketing, channel distribution and an integrated booking engine for one low monthly flat fee per room with no contracts required
